dialogUpdate.label: If you would like to update your payment date (vary your loan), please complete the mandatory fields and submit your request.
All variation requests are subject to credit criteria. We reserve the right to decline your request.
If your request is approved, you authorize UDC to vary your contract schedule as per your request and issue a disclosure notification to you.
If UDC is unable to approve your request, we will notify you.
If further information is required, we will contact you.
